ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, I m sending this a second time because it didn t appear to get through the first time. Anyway, here it is again; Does anyone at all have the zipped or
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 47
Message-ID: <17248.47.130.959279670@...>
Date: 3 Sep 1999 22:31:20 -0000
From: shayd@...
Subject: Glad


Hmm, I'm sending this a second time because it didn't appear to get through
the first time.

Anyway, here it is again; Does anyone at all have the zipped or complete
files for the Gladiator: Beyond Freedom demo?  I used to have it but since
I had to format my hard drive, I lost it and was unable to get it back
because the link on the site doesn't seem to work.  If you do, speak up
and maybe you can send it over to me, I could mirror it on my FTP for the
FSGames site (I run off a cable modem).  Also, if you've got it and don't
want to spend the time looking me up, upload it to a xoom account or
something and post the address to this list.  Someone has *got* to have
it.  Anyone? :)  (ICQ#: 18074806)

Thanks guys, enjoy your weekend.
     -Chris
